movie.title: The Green Mile
movie.actors: Tom Hanks, David Morse, Michael Clarke Duncan, Bonnie Hunt
movie.plot: Death Row guards at a penitentiary, in the 1930's, have a moral dilemma with their job when they discover one of their prisoners, a convicted murderer, has a special gift.
movie.awards: Nominated for 4 Oscars. Another 15 wins & 23 nominations.
movie.tomatoConsensus: Though The Green Mile is long, critics say it's an absorbing, emotionally powerful experience.
